Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: A disc shaped object with flashing lights was hovering over my skylight, it zoomed away, and ascended into the clouds.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my bed sleeping and I suddenly woke up, it was approximately 12:30 am, I looked out my skylight which was directly above me and saw a big, disc shaped object that had many flashing lights with different colors. It hovered over my skylight for about 10 seconds and then moved towards my window. I jumped out of my bed and ran too the window. It was there for about 30 seconds when zoomed off, changing its direction many times before it stopped and ascended into the sky.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Staten Island
There were no other sightings in Staten Island on or around October 13th 2010
